channel.title: Notes on Mr.Blue's notes
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Mr.Blue's notes

item.title: Git
item.author: silverhugh.77@gmail.com (Mr. Blue)
item.description: Some git notes. 基本配置 git config # List configuration git config -l git config --global -l # Config user's info git config --global user.name "Mr.Blue" git config --global user.email "silverhugh.77@gmail.com" # Delete config git config --global --unset user.username # Config editor for git, use vim, nano or so on git config --global core.editor "vim" # True way to Commit # `git commit` will open an vim editor (set by command before) # write the commit message in it and `:x` to commit See also: https://chris.

item.title: Python
item.author: silverhugh.77@gmail.com (Mr. Blue)
item.description: Some python notes. Quick notes enumerate. colors = ['red', 'green', 'blue', 'yellow'] for i, color in enumerate(colors): print i, '-->', color
